Class Main

java.lang.Object
Main
public class Main
extends java.lang.Object
Primary driver for facial recognition using DB of faces loaded from a file. Graphics window is created in which to display faces.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Main()

    Convert data read from file into a database of faces.

    Display all faces in graphics window

    Finds best match for toMatch in faces using the Face.compare method.
    static java.lang.Integer findWorstMatch​(Face toMatch, Face[] faces)
    Finds worst match for toMatch in faces using the Face.compare method.

    Create a file of random faces.

  • Constructor Details

    • Main

      public Main()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)

    • displayAll

      public static void displayAll​(Face[] faces)
      Display all faces in graphics window
      Parameters:
      faces - Collection of cartoon faces

    • findBestMatch

      public static java.lang.Integer findBestMatch​(Face toMatch, Face[] faces)
      Finds best match for toMatch in faces using the Face.compare method. The best match is the closest (or minimum) value returned from compare
      Parameters:
      toMatch - Face object to which all are compared
      faces - Collection of faces
      Returns:
      INDEX of the face that is closest to toMatch

    • findWorstMatch

      public static java.lang.Integer findWorstMatch​(Face toMatch, Face[] faces)
      Finds worst match for toMatch in faces using the Face.compare method. The worst match is the furthest (or maximum) value returned from compare
      Parameters:
      toMatch - Face object to which all are compared
      faces - Collection of faces
      Returns:
      INDEX of the face that is furthest from toMatch

    • createGraphicsWindow

      public static void createGraphicsWindow()
      Create pop-up graphics window in which all things are drawn.

    • buildDB

      public static Face[] buildDB​(java.lang.String[] features)
      Convert data read from file into a database of faces. The "DB" in this case is simply an array of faces
      Parameters:
      features - [] Each element is comma-separated values representing a face
      Returns:
      "DB" array of constructed faces

    • readFile

      public static java.lang.String[] readFile​(java.lang.String filename)
      Read all the faces in the file
      Parameters:
      filename - comma-separated values representing a face
      Returns:
      String array - each element is facial features of one face

    • readFile

      public static java.lang.String[] readFile​(java.lang.String filename, java.lang.Integer size)
      Read as many faces in the file as indicated by size.
      Parameters:
      filename - comma-separated values representing a face
      size - The number of lines to read from the file
      Returns:
      String array - each element is facial features of one face

    • makeFile

      public static void makeFile​(java.lang.String filename, java.lang.Integer size)
      Create a file of random faces. It will have "size" lines, each representing a face.
      Parameters:
      filename - File to write to -- this OVERWRITES the file!
      size - Number of random faces to store.

    • resizeArray

      public static java.lang.String[] resizeArray​(java.lang.String[] array, int size)
      Resize the array so that every array element has a face in it.
      Parameters:
      array - Each element is a face or null
      size - Copy over only "size" faces into the new array
      Returns:
      New array that is full (no null elements)
